summary.vsli:raw: Determines whether to append the output to the current file or write it to a new or existing file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.AutoFlush

summary.vsli:raw: Indicates whether or not the writing to the log file stream flushes the buffer.

member.summary: 指出對記錄檔資料流的寫入過程是否會清除緩衝區。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="Boolean" />, with <see langword="True" /> indicating that the stream is flushed after every write; otherwise the log entries are buffered and written more efficiently. The default setting for this property is <see langword="False" />.

member.returns: ，如果為 表示會在每次寫入後清除資料流，否則會緩衝記錄項目並且以更有效率的方式寫入。 這個屬性的預設設定為 。

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior

summary.vsli:raw: Determines what to do when writing to the log file and there is less free disk space available than specified by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace" /> property.

member.summary: 決定當寫入記錄檔而可用的磁碟空間少於 屬性所指定的空間時，所要執行的動作。

returns.vsli:raw: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.DiskSpaceExhaustedOption" />. Determines what to do when attempting to write to the log file and there is less free disk space available than specified by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace" /> property, or if the log file size is greater than what the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.MaxFileSize" /> property allows. The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.DiskSpaceExhaustedOption.DiscardMessages" />.

member.returns: . 決定當寫入記錄檔而可用的磁碟空間少於 屬性所指定的空間時，或是記錄檔大小大於 屬性所允許的大小時，所要執行的動作。 預設值是 。
